Class MemoryMessageStore

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.AbstractCollection<E>
      • java.util.AbstractSet<E>
        • java.util.TreeSet<MailMessage>
          • de.iss.mv2.client.data.MemoryMessageStore
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    MailStorage, java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable, java.lang.Iterable<MailMessage>, java.util.Collection<MailMessage>, java.util.NavigableSet<MailMessage>, java.util.Set<MailMessage>, java.util.SortedSet<MailMessage>

    public class MemoryMessageStore
extends java.util.TreeSet<MailMessage>
implements MailStorage
    A MailStorage that stores incoming mails inside the file system.
    Author:
    Marcel Singer
